item.value: Auction list for Tiroche
The date of their first auction that was created on Bidspirit will also help us solve the problem.
Eщё нам поможет решить проблему дата их первого аукциона что был создан на Bidspirit.
Can you provide us with a list of all the auctions?
Сможете предоставить нам список всех аукционов?
You can provide us with a list of all auctions or else help us solve the problem with the date of the first auction that was created on Bidspirit.
Сможете предоставить нам список всех аукционов или ещё нам поможет решить проблему дата их первого аукциона что был создан на Bidspirit.

We are working on a website for the auction house tiroche. (tiroche.bidspirit.com) Would like to get a list of all the auctions they have on your portal. They have their own old auctions and in some cases their numbering overlaps which causes problems migrating their old site to WordPress.

Работаем над сайтом для аукционного дома tiroche. (tiroche.bidspirit.com) Хотели бы получить список всех аукционов которые у них есть на вашем портале. У них есть свои старые аукционы и в некоторых случаях их нумерация пересекается что вызывает проблемы с переносом их старого сайта на WordPress.
Page Empty
We have added a blank template for these pages for the "Thanks page" page. All design elements can be customized from the admin panel.
Мы добавили пустой шаблон для таких страниц для страницы "Thanks page". Все элементы дизайна могут быть настроены из админ панели.
uco before init mutation
לקטלוג המכירה
Select the categories you want
Выберите нужные категории
We estimated the task of implementing post and pre sales of lots at 14 hours.
Мы оценили задачу по реализации post и pre продаж лотов в 14 часов.
פריט

Buys the item out of the auction. This api is available only for items that have a value in their buyoutPrice field. It is not possible to buyout an item if there is a higher leading bid. Also, it is not possible to buyout an item while the auction is live

The statement is true for the larger auctions: larger auctions are 180, 179, 178 etc. The number of the image is always Auction number+ item in 4 digits. However, some lots do have 2-3 pictures. The format today is not unique but we should decide on format for additional pics such as 1800500A or 1800500_A We need to set a format for the smaller auctions as well. Those are smaller auctions (online auctions) that consists 40 - 90 items and until today they were not shown on our website but just on Bidspirit. Today the pics are numbered just 1, 2, 3… etc with no specific auction number. However as the online auctions were never uploaded on Tiroche.co.il it was not a problem. We need to figure out a format for those online auctions as well.
Before installing the plugin please give us the domain and IP address and we will contact the bidspirit support team to whitelist the domain.
Give us the domain and IP address and we will contact the bidspirit support team to whitelist the domain.
Or give us the domain and IP address and we will contact the bidspirit support team to whitelist the domain.
Или сообщите нам домен и IP-адрес, и мы свяжемся со службой поддержки bidspirit что бы они добавили домен в белый список.
Or send us domain and ip address and we will contact bidspirit support for you.
Before installing the plugin please contact bidspirit support to whitelist the domain. Until then the plugin will not be functional.
Что на счёт этого клиента?
Извините, я ошибся
חזרה לקטלוג
פריט הבא
כניסה
Display Hours should appear in each auctions banner, and at the top of the page of the catalog on the site (see photos attached). Once clicked, there is a pop up with the info.

I don’t know how to help you with pictures from the server. I think only Tomer and Oren can. We started sending you pictures starting from auctions 120 through WeTransfer. Did you receive them? Basically we have all pictures from auctions 131. Before 131 we need to take them from the server. But I don’t know anything about the server

Moreover, on the site https:tiroche.co.il for the same auctions, the pictures are located in a different way: https:tiroche.co.ilItemPicsimageName.jpg That is, we have a difference between what comes to us from the database and what we see on the original site. And in addition, not all pictures for auctions are available to us along the way that come from the database http:tiroche.coItemPicsimageName.jpg As a result, we have a lot of auctions with broken pictures. See picture attached below.
Where does it shown?
What to do with lots with auctionId = null. We are unable to link these items to a specific auction.

The auction items can include only two price fields: Hammer price Price Inc. Commission Our commission is %18. once the hammer price is 1,000 the price with commission is automatically1,180 (unless the commission will increase). Final Price can be shown only on Buy-Now items (not auctions).
As the information is extremely sensitive, we would need you to sign a confidentiality agreement.
Before installing the plugin, contact the bidspirit support team to whitelist the domain by informing them of your Bidspirit profile and the ip address of your site.
We received a request to implement the possibility of selling lots before the start of the auction at a blitz price. What API requests should I use for this?
К нам поступил запрос на реализацию возможности продажи лотов до начала аукциона по блиц цене. Какие API запросы использовать для этого?
The error still appears. Please check again.
Ошибка по прежнему появляется. Проверьте пожалуйста ещё раз.
מכירה:
רוצה למכור?
מכירות עבר
